pages.text: Most recipes in your pedestal require some amount of Gemstone Powder as a source of magical energy.$(br)It comes in various colors and can be acquired by pulverizing $(l:general/shards)Gemstone Shards$() via $(l:general/anvil_crushing)Item Crushing$().

pages.title: Mixing Colors
pages.text: There is nothing more important to an upcoming artist than mixing the right paint.$(br)Unfortunately, you found that in the case of Gemstone Powder, it's not nearly as easy as it initially seemed. The powders don't quite want to mix, the result being just a multicolored mass.$(br2)Maybe you can come up with something later?
